divs: Sighting Detailson nov.6,09 at approximately 5;30 pm my son david and i went out of house to observe the aircraft that were flying over creating all the noise. we saw about 20 fighters jets bussing the skys of our town. this has never happened in the four years we have live here. it was quite scary, because the jets looked like a bunch of angary bees. we watched for about 10 minutes and went back into the house convinced they were playing some war games. about 5 minutes later marys car pulled into the driveway. i took her mail out to her,as i pickup her mail from her postal box. phyllis was with mary,both ladies steped out of the car to observe the planes that were making all the noise. my son david pointed to the northeast and said what is that. whereupon i looked and saw a big black triangle with 3 red lights,one on each tip. mary and pyllis became very excited as well as i and david. we were all talking at once about what we were seeing. this object just seemed to glide along quite slowly unconcerned about all the jets bussing around it like a bunch of angry bees. the object was huge the size was unbeliveable. it took abnout 4 minutes to pass headed toward the southeast.
Summary: myself and four other people saw a flying triangle surrounded by about 20 fighter jets.
